subject: AI & Agents
title: Deepfakes and Synthetic Media
description: A quick, practical guide to Deepfakes and Synthetic Media.

hook.text: A video of a world leader saying something they never said. It looks perfectly real.

buildup.text: Generative AI can create realistic fake images, audio, and video of real people.

discovery.text: Face-swap, voice-clone, and text-to-video models are now accessible to anyone.

twist.text: Detection tools exist but lag behind generation quality. Fakes improve faster than detectors.

climax.text: Watermarking, provenance tracking (C2PA), and media literacy are the current best defenses.

quiz.question: What is C2PA?
options: A provenance standard for tracking media origin
